brick_051.title: Moonlit Market - Merchant Rotation Logic
brick_051.description: Defines the rotating schedule and triggered responses of Moonlit Market merchants, including rare or pop-up vendor appearances.
elements: Triggered pop-ups (e.g., from completed side quests)

brick_052.title: Sassfirmation Scrolls - Delivery Mechanic
brick_052.description: Determines how Char’s sassfirmations are revealed: scroll animation, tap-trigger, dragon snort, etc.
elements: Quote is visible, with optional fire-charred edges

brick_053.title: Seraphine’s Scroll Stack - Dynamic Filtering
brick_053.description: Allows scroll stack visuals to shift based on user filters: love, betrayal, destiny, zodiac sign, etc.
elements: User can pin a favorite scroll

brick_054.title: Whispering Trees - Ritual Entry System
brick_054.description: Defines entrypoint behavior: wind rustling, tree glow, crow caw, whisper audio cue, etc.
elements: Unlocked by emotional trigger or timed window

brick_055.title: Sanctum Altar - Sacred Cycle Timer
brick_055.description: Hourglass-style timer tracking moon phases + Sabbat rituals. Hints when the altar has something new.
elements: Glowing hourglass flips on moon phase change
Interactive glow if user has unseen ritual
Locked during shadow periods unless override granted
